meanings.definition: A group of companies with interlocking relationships, often centered around a major bank.
meanings.sent1: The keiretsus in our town work closely together to achieve success.
meanings.sent2: The keiretsus in the industry collaborate to strengthen their positions.
meanings.sent3: The keiretsus decided to have a picnic together to bond outside of work.
meanings.sent4: The keiretsus intertwined like a complex web of connections.
meanings.sent5: The keiretsus resembled a tight-knit family, supporting each other through challenges.

meanings.definition: The practice of forming such a group.
meanings.sent1: The keiretsus formation process requires careful planning and coordination.
meanings.sent2: Many businesses engage in the keiretsus strategy to enhance their competitiveness.
meanings.sent3: The keiretsus creation event turned into a fun team-building exercise.
meanings.sent4: The keiretsus concept blossomed into a powerful network of companies.
meanings.sent5: The keiretsus establishment was a strategic move to strengthen market presence.
